item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to my blog. This blog is about my adventure switching from Windows to Linux, and the adventure after. Why did you switching from Windows to Linux? I have a bad experience on using Windows 10. It's not happening before with Windows XP, Windows 7, even Windows 8 and Vista. But Windows 10 there is bunch of problem happening everytime I install it, so i decided to switch to linux. More detail will be posted later.
